## ðŸ”„ The Experience: Benefits & Challenges



<h3>The Beneficial Aspect</h3>
<p>
The most valuable aspect of using GenAI was its ability to generate <strong>quick, reusable CSS styling</strong> that elevated the entire website's visual appeal. This dramatically reduced development time while maintaining professional quality.

<h3>The Challenge</h3>
<p>
The challenging part was learning to <strong>clearly define the design</strong> I wanted to adopt. GenAI tools like Claude can generate a wide variety of design styles, and if the prompt is not specific enough, the generated design may not align with my vision.
</p>
